item.title: 2. Load from File
item.description: tour/load_from_file/queries.sql {{ define "schema" }} CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS books ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT NOT NULL ) {{ end }} {{ define "insert_book" }} INSERT INTO books (title) VALUES ({{ . }}) RETURNING id; {{ end }} {{ define "get_book" }} SELECT id {{ ScanInt "ID" }} , title {{ ScanString "Title" }} FROM books WHERE id = {{ . }}; {{ end }} tour/load_from_file/repository.go package repository import ( "context" "database/sql" "github.

item.title: 3. Bulk Insert
item.description: tour/bulk_insert/queries.sql {{ define "schema" }} CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS books ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT NOT NULL, author TEXT NOT NULL ) {{ end }} {{ define "insert_book" }} INSERT INTO books (title, author) VALUES ({{ .Title }}, {{ .Author }}) RETURNING id; {{ end }} {{ define "insert_books" }} INSERT INTO books (title, author) VALUES {{ range $i, $c := . }} {{ if $i }}, {{ end }} ({{ $c.

item.title: 4. Transactions
item.description: tour/transactions/queries.sql {{ define "schema" }} CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS books ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT NOT NULL, author_id INTEGER REFERENCES authors(id), added_at DATE NOT NULL ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS authors ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT UNIQUE ); {{ end }} {{ define "upsert_author" }} INSERT INTO authors (name) VALUES ({{ .Author }}) ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET id = authors.id RETURNING id; {{ end }} {{ define "insert_book" }} INSERT INTO books (title, author_id, added_at) VALUES ({{ .
